record.title: webpage:  Discover
record.detail: Search functions to search and display contents of the database represented by/in this website

[{"name":"Page","type":"group","folder":true,"children":[{"name":"Header","type":"text","content":"

This is an unconfigured page. Remove these instructions , or replace them with your instructions for users.

\n

This page is set up as a container for database searches. Select [Insert] in menu (gear icon or context menu in tree on the left) to add text elements and widgets: search, results list and visualisation (map, timeline, network diagram, report etc.). 

\n

Click on [Style] in this menu to modify appearance and configure parameters for each of the components.
